Name: Saint George
Description: A parish on the island of Antigua, known for its residential communities and agricultural activities.

Name: Saint John
Description: Home to the capital city, St. John s, and the main commercial and governmental hub of the country.

Name: Saint Mary
Description: A region on Antigua’s western coast, known for its beaches and tourism-driven economy.

Name: Saint Paul
Description: Home to English Harbour and Nelson’s Dockyard, a historic area with a strong maritime history.

Name: Saint Peter
Description: Known for the town of Parham and its historical significance as one of Antigua’s early settlements.

Name: Saint Philip
Description: A less populated parish in the eastern part of Antigua, featuring scenic coastal areas.

Name: Barbuda
Description: A separate island north of Antigua, known for its untouched beaches and unique ecosystem.
